|fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT48LC16M16A2-75 D |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=PTNETW1350A |wi1_chip2_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6063 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=TI-AR7WRD |default_ssid_regex=^TI-AR7WRD$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=Admin |default_pass=Admin |oui=08:00:28 |oui_eth=00:AA:AA }} "TEXAS INSTRUMENTS", "AR7Wi REFERENCE DESIGN", "92-8275-["<sticker with "1">"] REV: ["<sticker with "4"> is silkscreened on the board. :An additional sticker with "SONIC 3705" is affixed to the board.
The CPU used is part TNETD7200GDW. The wireless module is using PTNETW1350A.
It appears the default USB ID for the slave USB connection is 0451:6060.
